name: Candy Seller
description:
A game made to call for attention to the reality of some poor children of developing countries, through a game in which we are a child who has to sell candy to cars stopped at traffic lights in order to be able to survive.

This game was made in a 4 days jam organized by Universidade Lusófona and the theme was to choose one or more of the United Nations 17 Sustainable Goals and work around it to create a meaningful game. To learn more about the 17 Sustainable Goals go to https://sdgs.un.org/goals.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Spacebar - pick up candies
Z - clean inventory

Team:
